Перекрестные ссылки load_textures(), Mem::Malloc() и NxNgc::pData.

Граф вызовов:

◆ LoadTextureGroup()

void NxPs2::LoadTextureGroup ( void *  pFile,
sScene *  pScene,
sGroup *  pGroup,
bool  IsSkin,
bool  IsInstanceable,
bool  UsesPip,
uint32  texDictOffset 
)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 235

236 {
237  sTexture *pTex, *pOriginalTexture=NULL;
238  uint32 TW, TH, PSM, CPSM;
239  uint TBP[7], TBW[7], CBP;
240  uint Width[7], Height[7], NumTexBytes[7], NumTexQWords[7], NumClutBytes, NumClutQWords, NumVramBytes[7];
241  uint BitsPerTexel, BitsPerClutEntry, PaletteSize, AdjustedWidth[7], AdjustedHeight[7];
242  uint PageWidth, PageHeight, AdjustedBitsPerTexel, TexCount=0;
243  int i,j,k,NumTexturesThisGroup,MXL;
244  uint NextTBP, LastCBP;
245  uint8 *pTextureSource;
246  static int Shit=0;
247 
248  Dbg_MsgAssert( pScene, ( "No pScene" ) );
249  Dbg_MsgAssert( pGroup, ( "No pre-allocated pGroup was specified" ) );
250 
251  // set the scene it belongs to
252  pGroup->pScene = pScene;
253 
254  pGroup->profile_color = 0x00c000; // green = static group (world, cars)
255  if (IsInstanceable)
256  {
257  pGroup->profile_color = 0x808000; // cyan = instancable static group (cars, gameobjs)
258  }
259  if (IsSkin)
260  {
261  pGroup->profile_color = 0x000080; // red = skin group
262  if (IsInstanceable)
263  {
264  pGroup->profile_color = 0x800080; // magenta = instancable skinned group
265  }
266  }
267 
268 
269  // zero the mesh pointer in case no meshes get loaded
270  pGroup->pMeshes = NULL;
271  pGroup->NumMeshes = 0;
272 
273  // prepare to build dma info for this group
274  dma::Align(0,16);
275  pGroup->pUpload[0] = pGroup->pUpload[1] = dma::pLoc;
276 
277  // get group checksum
278  pGroup->Checksum = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData;
279  pGroup->Checksum += texDictOffset;
280  sScene::pData+=4;
281 
282  // get group flags if present
283  if (sTexture::sVersion >= 2)
284  {
285  pGroup->flags = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
286  }
287  else if (pGroup->Checksum>=1000 & pGroup->Checksum<2000)
288  {
289  pGroup->flags = GROUPFLAG_SKY;
290  }
291  else
292  {
293  pGroup->flags = 0;
294  }
295 
296  // get group priority if present
297  if (sTexture::sVersion >= 4)
298  {
299  pGroup->Priority = *(float *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
300  }
301 
302  else
303  {
304  // set its priority manually
305  if (UsesPip)
306  {
307  switch (pGroup->flags & (GROUPFLAG_SKY|GROUPFLAG_TRANSPARENT))
308  {
309  case 0:
310  pGroup->Priority = 0;
311  break;
312  case GROUPFLAG_SKY:
313  pGroup->Priority = -100;
314  break;
315  case GROUPFLAG_TRANSPARENT:
316  pGroup->Priority = 7500;
317  break;
318  case GROUPFLAG_TRANSPARENT|GROUPFLAG_SKY:
319  pGroup->Priority = -99;
320  break;
321  }
322  }
323  if (IsSkin)
324  {
325  pGroup->Priority = 5000+Shit;
326  }
327  if (IsInstanceable)
328  {
329  pGroup->Priority = 2500+Shit;
330  }
331  }
332 
333  // if it has the lowest priority, make a new head
334  if (sGroup::pHead==NULL || pGroup->Priority < sGroup::pHead->Priority)
335  {
336  pGroup->pNext = sGroup::pHead;
337  pGroup->pPrev = NULL;
338  sGroup::pHead = pGroup;
339 
340  if (pGroup->pNext)
341  pGroup->pNext->pPrev = pGroup;
342  else
343  sGroup::pTail = pGroup;
344  }
345 
346  // othwerwise if it has the highest priority, make a new tail
347  else if (pGroup->Priority >= sGroup::pTail->Priority)
348  {
349  pGroup->pPrev = sGroup::pTail;
350  pGroup->pNext = NULL;
351  sGroup::pTail->pNext = pGroup;
352  sGroup::pTail = pGroup;
353  }
354 
355  // otherwise find its immediate superior, priority-wise, in the group list
356  else
357  {
358  sGroup *pSup;
359  for (pSup=sGroup::pHead; pSup; pSup=pSup->pNext)
360  {
361  if (pGroup->Priority < pSup->Priority)
362  break;
363  }
364 
365  Dbg_MsgAssert(pSup, ("error inserting into group list\n"));
366 
367  pGroup->pNext = pSup;
368  pGroup->pPrev = pSup->pPrev;
369  pSup->pPrev->pNext = pGroup;
370  pSup->pPrev = pGroup;
371  }
372 
373  // get number of textures
374  NumTexturesThisGroup = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
375 
376  // set vram usage for this group
377  pGroup->VramStart = sGroup::VramBufferBase;
378  pGroup->VramEnd = sGroup::VramBufferBase+0x0A20;
379 
380  // advance buffer for next group
381  sGroup::VramBufferBase ^= 0x1E20;
382 
383  // initialise base pointers
384  NextTBP = pGroup->VramStart;
385  LastCBP = pGroup->VramEnd;
386 
387  // loop over textures
388  for (i=0,pTex=pScene->pTextures+pScene->NumTextures; i<NumTexturesThisGroup; i++,pTex++)
389  {
390  // get texture flags
391  if (sTexture::sVersion >= 5)
392  {
393  pTex->Flags = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
394  }
395 
396  // get texture checksum
397  pTex->Checksum = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
398 
399  // set group checksum
400  pTex->GroupChecksum = pGroup->Checksum;
401 
402  // get dimensions
403  TW = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
404  TH = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
405 
406  // get pixel storage modes
407  PSM = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4; // for texels
408  CPSM = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4; // for clut
409 
410  // get maximum mipmap level
411  MXL = *(uint32 *)sScene::pData, sScene::pData+=4;
412 
413  // clear buffer pointers
414  pTex->mp_texture_buffer = NULL;
415  pTex->mp_clut_buffer = NULL;
416  pTex->m_texture_buffer_size = 0;
417  pTex->m_clut_buffer_size = 0;
418 
419  // bail if it's a non-texture
420  if (TW == 0xFFFFFFFF)
421  {
422  printf("non-texture at number %d\n", i);
423  // there won't be any more data for this texture
424  continue;
425  }
426 
427  // detect duplicated texture, signalled by MXL of -1
428  if (MXL<0)
429  {
430  // find the original texture
431  pOriginalTexture = ResolveTextureChecksum(pTex->Checksum);
432 
433  // adjust MXL
434  MXL &= 0x7FFFFFFF;
435 
436  // signal duplicate
437  pTex->Flags &= ~TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL;
438  }
439  else
440  {
441  // not a duplicate, must be the original
442  pTex->Flags |= TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL;
443  }
444 
445  // quadword-align (original only)
446  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
447  {
448  sScene::pData = (uint8 *)(((uint)(sScene::pData+15)) & 0xFFFFFFF0);
449  }
450 
451  // bits per texel and palette size
452  switch (PSM)
453  {
454  case PSMCT32:
455  BitsPerTexel = 32;
456  PaletteSize = 0;
457  break;
458  case PSMCT24:
459  BitsPerTexel = 24;
460  PaletteSize = 0;
461  break;
462  case PSMCT16:
463  BitsPerTexel = 16;
464  PaletteSize = 0;
465  break;
466  case PSMT8:
467  BitsPerTexel = 8;
468  PaletteSize = 256;
469  break;
470  case PSMT4:
471  BitsPerTexel = 4;
472  PaletteSize = 16;
473  break;
474  default:
475  printf("Unknown PSM %d at index %d in texture file\n", PSM, i);
476  exit(1);
477  }
478 
479  // adjust bits per texel for 24-bit
480  AdjustedBitsPerTexel = BitsPerTexel;
481  if (BitsPerTexel == 24)
482  {
483  AdjustedBitsPerTexel = 32;
484  }
485 
486  // bits per clut entry
487  if (BitsPerTexel < 16)
488  switch (CPSM)
489  {
490  case PSMCT32:
491  BitsPerClutEntry = 32;
492  break;
493  case PSMCT16:
494  BitsPerClutEntry = 16;
495  break;
496  default:
497  printf("Unknown CPSM %d in texture file\n", PSM);
498  exit(1);
499  }
500  else
501  BitsPerClutEntry = 0;
502 
503  // rearrange original 256-colour cluts according to requirements of CSM1
504  if (PSM==PSMT8 && (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL))
505  {
506  uint32 temp32;
507  uint16 temp16;
508  for (j=0; j<256; j+=32)
509  for (k=0; k<8; k++)
510  if (CPSM==PSMCT32)
511  {
512  temp32 = ((uint32 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+8];
513  ((uint32 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+8] = ((uint32 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+16];
514  ((uint32 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+16] = temp32;
515  }
516  else
517  {
518  temp16 = ((uint16 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+8];
519  ((uint16 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+8] = ((uint16 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+16];
520  ((uint16 *)sScene::pData)[j+k+16] = temp16;
521  }
522  }
523 
524  // calculate texture dimensions
525  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
526  {
527  Width[j] = (TW>=0 ? 1<<TW : 0) >> j;
528  Height[j] = (TH>=0 ? 1<<TH : 0) >> j;
529  TBW[j] = (Width[j]+63) >> 6;
530  if (BitsPerTexel<16 && TBW[j]<2)
531  TBW[j] = 2;
532  }
533 
534  // get page size
535  switch (PSM)
536  {
537  case PSMCT32:
538  case PSMCT24:
539  PageWidth = 64;
540  PageHeight = 32;
541  break;
542  case PSMCT16:
543  PageWidth = 64;
544  PageHeight = 64;
545  break;
546  case PSMT8:
547  PageWidth = 128;
548  PageHeight = 64;
549  break;
550  case PSMT4:
551  PageWidth = 128;
552  PageHeight = 128;
553  break;
554  default:
555  printf("Unknown PSM %d at index %d in texture file\n", PSM, i);
556  exit(1);
557  }
558 
559  // calculate adjusted dimensions based on vram page size
560  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
561  {
562  AdjustedWidth[j] = Width[j];
563  AdjustedHeight[j] = Height[j];
564 
565  if (AdjustedWidth[j] < PageWidth && AdjustedHeight[j] > PageHeight)
566  {
567  AdjustedWidth[j] = PageWidth;
568  }
569 
570  if (AdjustedWidth[j] > PageWidth && AdjustedHeight[j] < PageHeight)
571  {
572  AdjustedHeight[j] = PageHeight;
573  }
574 
575  if (TBW[j]<<6 > AdjustedWidth[j])
576  {
577  AdjustedWidth[j] = TBW[j]<<6;
578  }
579  }
580 
581  // calculate sizes within file
582  NumClutBytes = PaletteSize * BitsPerClutEntry >> 3;
583  NumClutQWords = NumClutBytes >> 4;
584  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
585  {
586  NumTexBytes[j] = Width[j] * Height[j] * BitsPerTexel >> 3;
587  NumVramBytes[j] = AdjustedWidth[j] * AdjustedHeight[j] * AdjustedBitsPerTexel >> 3;
588  NumTexQWords[j] = (NumTexBytes[j]+15) >> 4;
589  }
590 
591  // calculate TBP
592  TBP[0] = NextTBP;
593  for (j=1; j<=MXL; j++)
594  TBP[j] = (((TBP[j-1]<<8)+NumVramBytes[j-1]+0x1FFF) & 0xFFFFE000) >> 8;
595 
596  // calculate CBP
597  if (BitsPerTexel >= 16)
598  CBP = LastCBP;
599  else if (BitsPerTexel == 4)
600  CBP = LastCBP - 1;
601  else
602  CBP = LastCBP - (CPSM==PSMCT32 ? 4 : 2);
603 
604  // calculate next TBP
605  NextTBP = (((TBP[MXL]<<8)+NumVramBytes[MXL]+0x1FFF) & 0xFFFFE000) >> 8;
606 
607  // bail if VRAM would become over-packed
608  if (NextTBP > CBP)
609  {
610  printf("no room for texture %d\n", i);
611  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
612  {
613  sScene::pData += NumClutBytes;
614  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
615  {
616  sScene::pData = (uint8 *)(((uint)(sScene::pData+NumTexBytes[j]+15)) & 0xFFFFFFF0);
617  }
618  }
619  continue;
620  }
621 
622  // add clut upload to dma list if necessary
623  if (BitsPerTexel < 16)
624  {
625  // source
626  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
627  {
628  pTextureSource = sScene::pData;
629  }
630  else
631  {
632  pTextureSource = pOriginalTexture->mp_clut_buffer;
633  }
634 
635  // save buffer pointer
636  pTex->mp_clut_buffer = pTextureSource;
637  pTex->m_clut_buffer_size = NumClutBytes;
638 
639  // add dma
640  dma::BeginTag(dma::cnt,0);
641  vif::NOP();
642  vif::NOP();
643  gif::Tag2(gs::A_D,1,PACKED,0,0,0,4);
644  gs::Reg2(gs::BITBLTBUF,PackBITBLTBUF(0,0,0,CBP,1,CPSM));
645  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXPOS, PackTRXPOS(0,0,0,0,0));
646  if (PSM==PSMT4)
647  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXREG,PackTRXREG(8,2));
648  else
649  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXREG,PackTRXREG(16,16));
650  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXDIR, 0);
651  gif::Tag2(0,0,IMAGE,0,0,0,NumClutQWords);
652  dma::EndTag();
653  dma::Tag(dma::ref, NumClutQWords, (uint)pTextureSource);
654  vif::NOP();
655  vif::NOP();
656  }
657 
658  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
659  {
660  // step past clut data, and quadword-align
661  sScene::pData = (uint8 *)(((uint)(sScene::pData+NumClutBytes+15)) & 0xFFFFFFF0);
662 
663  // save buffer pointer
664  pTex->mp_texture_buffer = sScene::pData;
665  }
666  else
667  {
668  pTex->mp_texture_buffer = pOriginalTexture->mp_texture_buffer;
669  }
670  pTextureSource = pTex->mp_texture_buffer;
671 
672 
673  // offset to improve caching
674  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
675  {
676  if (TexCount & 1)
677  {
678  if ((BitsPerTexel==32 || BitsPerTexel==8)
679  && (Width[j] <= (PageWidth>>1))
680  && (Height[j] <= PageHeight)
681  ||
682  (BitsPerTexel==16 || BitsPerTexel==4)
683  && (Width[j] <= PageWidth)
684  && (Height[j] <= (PageHeight>>1)))
685  {
686  TBP[j] += 16;
687  //printf("better caching!\n");
688  }
689  }
690  TexCount++;
691  }
692 
693 #if SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
694  bool swizzleTex = BitsPerTexel <= 8;
695 #endif // SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
696 
697  // loop over mipmaps
698  for (j=0; j<=MXL; j++)
699  {
700 #if SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
701  int swizzle_tbw = TBW[j];
702  int swizzle_width = Width[j];
703  int swizzle_height = Height[j];
704  uint32 swizzlePSM = PSM;
705  bool swizzleMip = false;
706 
707  if (swizzleTex)
708  {
709  switch (PSM)
710  {
711  case PSMT8:
712  {
713  if (TexMemLayout.CanConv8to32(Width[j], Height[j]))
714  {
715  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
716  {
717  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap());
718  uint8 *pTextureSwizzle = (uint8 *) Mem::Malloc(Width[j] * Height[j]);
719  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
720 
721  TexMemLayout.Conv8to32(Width[j], Height[j], pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle);
722  memcpy(pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle, Width[j] * Height[j]);
723 
724  Mem::Free(pTextureSwizzle);
725  }
726 
727  // Change size to 32-bit version
728  swizzle_width /= 2;
729  swizzle_height /= 2;
730 
731  // Recalculate Buffer Width since 8-bit version can be artificially high
732  swizzle_tbw = swizzle_width / 64;
733  if (swizzle_tbw == 0)
734  swizzle_tbw = 1;
735 
736  swizzleMip = true;
737  swizzlePSM=PSMCT32; // swizzle
738  pTex->Flags |= TEXFLAG_MIP_SWIZZLE_32BIT(j);
739  }
740  break;
741  }
742  case PSMT4:
743  {
744  if (TexMemLayout.CanConv4to32(Width[j], Height[j]))
745  {
746  //Dbg_Message("Swizzling texture checksum %x", pTex->Checksum);
747 
748  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
749  {
750  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap());
751  uint8 *pTextureSwizzle = (uint8 *) Mem::Malloc(Width[j] * Height[j] / 2);
752  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
753 
754  TexMemLayout.Conv4to32(Width[j], Height[j], pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle);
755  memcpy(pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle, Width[j] * Height[j] / 2);
756 
757  Mem::Free(pTextureSwizzle);
758  }
759 
760  // Change size to 32-bit version
761  swizzle_width /= 2;
762  swizzle_height /= 4;
763 
764  // Recalculate Buffer Width since 4-bit version can be artificially high
765  swizzle_tbw = swizzle_width / 64;
766  if (swizzle_tbw == 0)
767  swizzle_tbw = 1;
768 
769  swizzleMip = true;
770  swizzlePSM=PSMCT32; // swizzle
771  pTex->Flags |= TEXFLAG_MIP_SWIZZLE_32BIT(j);
772  }
773  else if (TexMemLayout.CanConv4to16(Width[j], Height[j]))
774  {
775  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
776  {
777  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap());
778  uint8 *pTextureSwizzle = (uint8 *) Mem::Malloc(Width[j] * Height[j] / 2);
779  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
780 
781  TexMemLayout.Conv4to16(Width[j], Height[j], pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle);
782  memcpy(pTextureSource, pTextureSwizzle, Width[j] * Height[j] / 2);
783 
784  Mem::Free(pTextureSwizzle);
785  }
786 
787  // Change size to 16-bit version
788  swizzle_width /= 2;
789  swizzle_height /= 2;
790 
791  // Recalculate Buffer Width since 4-bit version can be artificially high
792  swizzle_tbw = swizzle_width / 64;
793  if (swizzle_tbw == 0)
794  swizzle_tbw = 1;
795 
796  swizzleMip = true;
797  swizzlePSM=PSMCT16; // swizzle
798  pTex->Flags |= TEXFLAG_MIP_SWIZZLE_16BIT(j);
799  }
800  break;
801  }
802 
803  default:
804  break;
805  }
806  }
807 #endif // SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
808 
809 
810  // add texture upload to dma list for this mipmap level
811  dma::BeginTag(dma::cnt,0);
812  vif::NOP();
813  vif::NOP();
814  gif::Tag2(gs::A_D,1,PACKED,0,0,0,4);
815 #if SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
816  gs::Reg2(gs::BITBLTBUF,PackBITBLTBUF(0,0,0,TBP[j],swizzle_tbw,swizzlePSM));
817  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXPOS, PackTRXPOS(0,0,0,0,0));
818  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXREG, PackTRXREG(swizzle_width,swizzle_height));
819 #else
820  gs::Reg2(gs::BITBLTBUF,PackBITBLTBUF(0,0,0,TBP[j],TBW[j],PSM));
821  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXPOS, PackTRXPOS(0,0,0,0,0));
822  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXREG, PackTRXREG(Width[j],Height[j]));
823 #endif // SWIZZLE_IN_LOAD
824  gs::Reg2(gs::TRXDIR, 0);
825 
826  if (j==0)
827  {
828  pTex->mp_dma = dma::pLoc;
829  pTex->m_quad_words = NumTexQWords[j];
830  pTex->m_render_count = 0;
831  }
832 
833 
834  gif::Tag2(0, 0, IMAGE, 0, 0, 0, NumTexQWords[j]); // 0..3 words, NumTexQWords is in the lower 15 bits of the first word [0]
835  dma::EndTag(); // Just Aligns upo to QW boundry
836  dma::Tag(dma::ref, NumTexQWords[j], (uint)pTextureSource); // 0..1 (after alignment) NumTexQWords goes in word 1
837  vif::NOP();
838  vif::NOP();
839 
840  // step past tex data for this level
841  pTextureSource += NumTexBytes[j];
842  }
843 
844  pTex->m_texture_buffer_size = (uint32) pTextureSource - (uint32) pTex->mp_texture_buffer;
845 
846  if (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL)
847  {
848  sScene::pData = pTextureSource;
849  }
850 
851  // make entry in texture table
852  pTex->MXL = MXL;
853  pTex->RegTEX0 = PackTEX0(TBP[0],TBW[0],PSM,TW,TH,(PSM!=PSMCT24),MODULATE,CBP,CPSM,0,0,1);
854  pTex->RegMIPTBP1 = PackMIPTBP1(TBP[1],TBW[1],TBP[2],TBW[2],TBP[3],TBW[3]);
855  pTex->RegMIPTBP2 = PackMIPTBP2(TBP[4],TBW[4],TBP[5],TBW[5],TBP[6],TBW[6]);
856 
857  // advance texture base pointer to 1st page after texture
858  // and reduce clut base pointer to 1st page before clut (if there was one)
859  TBP[0] = NextTBP;
860  LastCBP = CBP;
861 
862  }
863 
864  // add to total for the scene
865  pScene->NumTextures += NumTexturesThisGroup;
866 
867  // texflush so we can use textures
868  dma::BeginTag(dma::end, 0);
869  vif::NOP();
870  vif::NOP();
871  gif::Tag2(gs::A_D,1,PACKED,0,0,1,1);
872  gs::Reg2(gs::TEXFLUSH, 0);
873  dma::EndTag();
874 
875  if (UsesPip==false)
876  {
877  Shit++;
878  }
879 
880 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxPs2::gs::A_D, NxPs2::dma::Align(), NxPs2::dma::BeginTag(), NxPs2::gs::BITBLTBUF, NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::CanConv4to16(), NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::CanConv4to32(), NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::CanConv8to32(), NxPs2::sGroup::Checksum, NxPs2::sTexture::Checksum, NxPs2::dma::cnt, NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::Conv4to16(), NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::Conv4to32(), NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::Conv8to32(), NxPs2::dma::end, NxPs2::dma::EndTag(), NxPs2::sGroup::flags, NxPs2::sTexture::Flags, Mem::Free(), NxPs2::sTexture::GroupChecksum, NxNgc::LastCBP, NxPs2::sTexture::m_clut_buffer_size, NxPs2::sTexture::m_quad_words, NxPs2::sTexture::m_render_count, NxPs2::sTexture::m_texture_buffer_size, Mem::Malloc(), NxPs2::sTexture::mp_clut_buffer, NxPs2::sTexture::mp_dma, NxPs2::sTexture::mp_texture_buffer, NxPs2::sTexture::MXL, NxNgc::NextTBP, NxPs2::vif::NOP(), NxPs2::sGroup::NumMeshes, NxPs2::sScene::NumTextures, NxPs2::sScene::pData, NxPs2::sGroup::pHead, NxPs2::dma::pLoc, NxPs2::sGroup::pMeshes, NxPs2::sGroup::pNext, Mem::Manager::PopContext(), NxPs2::sGroup::pPrev, printf(), NxPs2::sGroup::Priority, NxPs2::sGroup::profile_color, NxPs2::sGroup::pScene, NxPs2::sGroup::pTail, NxPs2::sScene::pTextures, NxPs2::sGroup::pUpload, Mem::Manager::PushContext(), NxPs2::dma::ref, NxPs2::gs::Reg2(), NxPs2::sTexture::RegMIPTBP1, NxPs2::sTexture::RegMIPTBP2, NxPs2::sTexture::RegTEX0, ResolveTextureChecksum(), Mem::Manager::sHandle(), NxPs2::sTexture::sVersion, NxPs2::dma::Tag(), NxPs2::gif::Tag2(), NxPs2::gs::TEXFLUSH, TexMemLayout, NxPs2::gs::TRXDIR, NxPs2::gs::TRXPOS, NxPs2::gs::TRXREG, NxPs2::sGroup::VramBufferBase, NxPs2::sGroup::VramEnd и NxPs2::sGroup::VramStart.

Используется в load_textures().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ DeleteTextures()

void NxPs2::DeleteTextures ( sScene *  pScene)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 885

886 {
887  sScene *pPrev;
888  sGroup *pGroup, *pDead;
889 
890  // deallocate assets
891  Mem::Free(pScene->pTexBuffer);
892  Mem::Free(pScene->pTexDma);
893  if( pScene->pTextures != NULL )
894  {
895  Mem::Free(pScene->pTextures);
896  }
897 
898  // deallocate groups
899  pGroup = sGroup::pHead;
900  while (pGroup)
901  {
902  if (pGroup->pScene == pScene)
903  {
904  if (pGroup == sGroup::pHead)
905  {
906  pGroup->pNext->pPrev = NULL;
907  sGroup::pHead = pGroup->pNext;
908  }
909  else if (pGroup == sGroup::pTail)
910  {
911  pGroup->pPrev->pNext = NULL;
912  sGroup::pTail = pGroup->pPrev;
913  }
914  else
915  {
916  pGroup->pNext->pPrev = pGroup->pPrev;
917  pGroup->pPrev->pNext = pGroup->pNext;
918  }
919  pDead = pGroup;
920  pGroup = pGroup->pNext;
921  Mem::Free(pDead);
922  }
923  else
924  pGroup = pGroup->pNext;
925  }
926 
927  // unlink
928  if (pScene==sScene::pHead)
929  sScene::pHead = pScene->pNext;
930  else
931  {
932  for (pPrev=sScene::pHead; pPrev; pPrev=pPrev->pNext)
933  if (pPrev->pNext == pScene)
934  break;
935  Dbg_MsgAssert(pPrev, ("couldn't find scene to delete\n"));
936 
937  pPrev->pNext = pScene->pNext;
938  }
939 
940  // free
941  Mem::Free(pScene);
942 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mem::Free(), NxPs2::sGroup::pHead, NxPs2::sScene::pHead, NxPs2::sGroup::pNext, NxPs2::sScene::pNext, NxPs2::sGroup::pPrev, NxPs2::sGroup::pScene, NxPs2::sGroup::pTail, NxPs2::sScene::pTexBuffer, NxPs2::sScene::pTexDma и NxPs2::sScene::pTextures.

Используется в Nx::CPs2TexDict::UnloadTextureDictionary().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ ResolveTextureChecksum() [1/2]

sTexture * NxPs2::ResolveTextureChecksum ( uint32  TextureChecksum)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 948

949 {
950  sScene *pScene;
951  sTexture *pTex=NULL;
952  int i;
953 
954  for (pScene=sScene::pHead; pScene; pScene=pScene->pNext)
955  {
956  for (i=0,pTex=pScene->pTextures; i<pScene->NumTextures; i++,pTex++)
957  if ((pTex->Checksum == TextureChecksum) && (pTex->Flags & TEXFLAG_ORIGINAL))
958  return pTex;
959  }
960 
961  return NULL;
962 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxPs2::sTexture::Checksum, NxPs2::sTexture::Flags, NxNgc::NumTextures, NxPs2::sScene::pHead, NxPs2::sScene::pNext и NxPs2::sScene::pTextures.

Используется в LoadMaterials() и LoadTextureGroup().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ ResolveTextureChecksum() [2/2]

sTexture * NxPs2::ResolveTextureChecksum ( uint32  TextureChecksum,
uint32  GroupChecksum 
)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 966

967 {
968  sScene *pScene;
969  sTexture *pTex=NULL;
970  int i;
971 
972  for (pScene=sScene::pHead; pScene; pScene=pScene->pNext)
973  {
974  for (i=0,pTex=pScene->pTextures; i<pScene->NumTextures; i++,pTex++)
975  if ((pTex->Checksum == TextureChecksum) && (pTex->GroupChecksum == GroupChecksum))
976  return pTex;
977  }
978 
979  return NULL;
980 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxPs2::sTexture::Checksum, NxPs2::sTexture::GroupChecksum, NxNgc::NumTextures, NxPs2::sScene::pHead, NxPs2::sScene::pNext и NxPs2::sScene::pTextures.

◆ readTexPSMCT16()

void NxPs2::readTexPSMCT16 ( int  dbp,
int  dbw,
int  dsax,
int  dsay,
int  rrw,
int  rrh,
void *  data 
)

См. определение в файле texturemem.cpp строка 405

406 {
407  //dbw >>= 1;
408  unsigned short *src = (unsigned short *)data;
409  int startBlockPos = dbp * 64;
410 
411  for(int y = dsay; y < dsay + rrh; y++)
412  {
413  int pageY = y / 64;
414  int py = y - (pageY * 64);
415  int blockY = py / 8;
416  int by = py - blockY * 8;
417 
418  int column = by / 2;
419  int cy = by - column * 2;
420 
421  for(int x = dsax; x < dsax + rrw; x++)
422  {
423  int pageX = x / 64;
424  int page = pageX + pageY * dbw;
425 
426  int px = x - (pageX * 64);
427 
428  int blockX = px / 16;
429  int block = block16[blockX + blockY * 4];
430 
431  int bx = px - blockX * 16;
432 
433  int cx = bx;
434  int cw = columnWord16[cx + cy * 16];
435  int ch = columnHalf16[cx + cy * 16];
436 
437  int gs_index = startBlockPos + page * 2048 + block * 64 + column * 16 + cw;
438  Dbg_MsgAssert(gs_index < gsmem_size, ("GS simulator memory size: %d; addressing: %d", gsmem_size, gs_index));
439  unsigned short *dst = (unsigned short *)&p_gsmem[gs_index];
440  *src = dst[ch];
441  src++;
442  }
443  }
444 }

Перекрестные ссылки block16, columnHalf16, columnWord16, NxPs2::render::cx, NxPs2::render::cy, Gfx::data, gsmem_size, p_gsmem, Nx::x и Nx::y.

Используется в NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::Conv4to16().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ writeTexPSMT4()

void NxPs2::writeTexPSMT4 ( int  dbp,
int  dbw,
int  dsax,
int  dsay,
int  rrw,
int  rrh,
void *  data 
)

См. определение в файле texturemem.cpp строка 485

486 {
487  dbw >>= 1;
488  unsigned char *src = (unsigned char *)data;
489  int startBlockPos = dbp * 64;
490 
491  bool odd = false;
492 
493  for(int y = dsay; y < dsay + rrh; y++)
494  {
495  int pageY = y / 128;
496  int py = y - (pageY * 128);
497  int blockY = py / 16;
498  int by = py - blockY * 16;
499 
500  int column = by / 4;
501  int cy = by - column * 4;
502 
503  for(int x = dsax; x < dsax + rrw; x++)
504  {
505  int pageX = x / 128;
506  int page = pageX + pageY * dbw;
507 
508  int px = x - (pageX * 128);
509 
510  int blockX = px / 32;
511  int block = block4[blockX + blockY * 4];
512 
513  int bx = px - blockX * 32;
514 
515  int cx = bx;
516  int cw = columnWord4[column & 1][cx + cy * 32];
517  int cb = columnByte4[cx + cy * 32];
518 
519  int gs_index = startBlockPos + page * 2048 + block * 64 + column * 16 + cw;
520  Dbg_MsgAssert(gs_index < gsmem_size, ("GS simulator memory size: %d; addressing: %d", gsmem_size, gs_index));
521  unsigned char *dst = (unsigned char *)&p_gsmem[gs_index];
522 
523  if(cb & 1)
524  {
525  if(odd)
526  dst[cb >> 1] = (dst[cb >> 1] & 0x0f) | ((*src) & 0xf0);
527  else
528  dst[cb >> 1] = (dst[cb >> 1] & 0x0f) | (((*src) << 4) & 0xf0);
529  }
530  else
531  {
532  if(odd)
533  dst[cb >> 1] = (dst[cb >> 1] & 0xf0) | (((*src) >> 4) & 0x0f);
534  else
535  dst[cb >> 1] = (dst[cb >> 1] & 0xf0) | ((*src) & 0x0f);
536  }
537 
538  if(odd)
539  src++;
540 
541  odd = !odd;
542  }
543  }
544 }

Перекрестные ссылки block4, columnByte4, columnWord4, NxPs2::render::cx, NxPs2::render::cy, Gfx::data, gsmem_size, p_gsmem, Nx::x и Nx::y.

Используется в NxPs2::TextureMemoryLayout::Conv4to16().
